title: Wildlife Rescue
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,321 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 950L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and X		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and X
description: Wildlife Rescue informs readers about the rehabilitation of injured animals. It tells readers what to do if they find an injured animal and describes the many steps that are taken to rehabilitate these animals. The book also discusses disaster rescues and the release of rehabilitated wildlife.
highFrequencyWords: contact, equipment, habitats, injured, orphaned, rehabilitators, rescue, survive, wildlife
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Prepositions                : Understand and use prepositions within sentences
awareness: Suffixes : Identify how the suffix -ion changes the meaning of words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
